translations: [生化]糖皮质激素（glucocorticoid 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Objective: To explore the possible mechanism of glucocorticoids on nasal polyps.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨糖皮质激素治疗鼻息肉的可能机制。

sentences.sentence: Objective: To explore the therapeutic effect on epidemic encephalitis B by Glucocorticoids.
sentences.translation: 目的：探讨糖皮质激素治疗流行性乙型脑炎的疗效。

sentences.sentence: But the reduced cerebellum size was seen even in babies given very small doses of the glucocorticoids.
sentences.translation: 但是他们也发现，即使给婴儿注射很少量的糖皮质激素也会导致其小脑的尺寸偏小。
